root.Summary: 1: Mehmood T, Schneider A, Pannetier S, Hanauer A. Rsk2 Knockdown in PC12 CellsResults in Sp1 Dependent Increased Expression of the Gria2 Gene, Encoding theAMPA Receptor Subunit GluR2.
